reviewText: This just makes sense. I am excited to try this approach next school year. The reasons kids tend to not like writing is dealt with. To me,  it just seems like a great way to address motivating students to improve.
Not much new content and you will have to purchase another product in order to get the full program for child's improvement program.

I have been searching for a helpful graphic organizer for my child diagnosed with dysgraphia for his teachers to use with him. This is an excellent technique that I expect will be very helpful. I will update my review when I can report back the results.
